##17.2
1. Variables are living_area and bathrooms.
2. No
3. The difference is about $28,372
4.
```{r}
library(DataComputing)
Houses <- read.csv("http://tiny.cc/dcf/houses-for-sale.csv")
```

```{r}
mod <- party::ctree(price ~ living_area + bathrooms + fireplaces, data=Houses)
plot(mod, type="simple")
```

Fireplace only has effects on price for houses whose living area is greater than 2816 square feet.

```{r}
mod1 <- party::ctree(price ~., data = Houses)
plot(mod1, type = "simple")
```

Land values, age, air conditioning, bedrooms, lot size and percent residents with college degree also affect price.
